title: Strengthen your immune system and watch out your physical condition
descr: Good food, sound sleep, exercise and fluid balance will help you stay healthy.

title: Consult with your family doctor in time
descr: Once you have noticed first symptoms of acute respiratory viral infection, consult with your family doctor.

title: Wash your hands with soap for 20 seconds
descr: or use a hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% -80% alcohol

title: Avoid contacts with people who have acute respiratory viral infection related symptoms
Avoid touching your face
descr: Do not touch your eyes, nose and mouth with dirty hands.

title: Eat thermally processed food
descr: Do not eat raw meat, meat by-products and eggs.
